item.title: Prue Leith leaves The Great British Bake Off
item.description: She has been a judge on Channel 4's baking competition alongside Paul Hollywood since 2017.

item.title: Trump says he won't use 'excessive force' to get Greenland
item.description: US President Donald Trump said he is seeking immediate negotiations to acquire Greenland in his speech at the World Economic Forum in Davos.

item.title: Israeli PM Netanyahu agrees to join Trump's Board of Peace
item.description: Israel is the latest country to publicly accept an invitation to Trump's new organisation, joining Albania, Bahran, Hungary, Morocco and the UAE.

item.title: Nature loss is a national security risk, intelligence group warns
item.description: The degradation of ecosystems around the world threatens UK food security, a long-awaited report says.

item.title: Could US Congress stop Trump from taking over Greenland?
item.description: Some of the president's fellow Republicans oppose him - but it's not clear if they would join Democrats to block a takeover of the island.
